works.description:
We have seen plenty of gold plated Nokia  
handsets, but the latest one comes from the house of Nokia itself. A great  
option for those who can’t afford a Vertu version, the new Nokia Oro  
features 18-carat gold plating, a sapphire crystal and leather from one of  
Scotland’s finest Caledonian herds. The Oro (meaning “Gold” in Italian)  
handset is basically the Symbian-based Nokia C7, which has been given the  
gilded treatment.
